Subject: Reconciliation Issue Regarding Your Recent Transaction TRX22474

Dear Client,

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to inform you about an issue that has occurred with your recent transaction, TRX22474, for the amount of 24857.57 JPY.

The transaction has not been processed due to a mismatch in the Sender_BIC (Bank Identifier Code). The Sender_BIC is a unique identification code for a particular bank, which is essential for processing international transactions. In your case, the Sender_BIC provided does not match our records, hence the transaction was unable to proceed.

I understand that this might cause some inconvenience and I sincerely apologize for this. However, to resolve this issue, we kindly request you to recheck the Sender_BIC you provided during the transaction. Please ensure that the code is accurate and corresponds to your bank. 

If you are unsure about your BIC, I would advise contacting your bank. They will be able to provide you with the correct information. Once you have the correct BIC, please update the details in our system or you may provide it to us and we will update it for you.
